resource-agent.name: fence_heuristics_ping
resource-agent.shortdesc: Fence agent for ping-heuristic based fencing
resource-agent.longdesc:
fence_heuristics_ping uses ping-heuristics to control execution of another fence agent on the same fencing level.
This is not a fence agent by itself! Its only purpose is to enable/disable another fence agent that lives on the same fencing level but after fence_heuristics_ping.

parameter.name: action
parameter.shortdesc: Fencing action

parameter.name: method
parameter.shortdesc: Method to fence

parameter.name: ping_count
parameter.shortdesc: The number of ping-probes that is being sent per target

parameter.name: ping_good_count
parameter.shortdesc: The number of positive ping-probes required to account a target as available

parameter.name: ping_interval
parameter.shortdesc: The interval in seconds between ping-probes

parameter.name: ping_maxfail
parameter.shortdesc: The number of failed ping-targets to still account as overall success

parameter.name: ping_targets
parameter.shortdesc: A comma separated list of ping-targets (optionally prepended by 'inet:' or 'inet6:') to be probed

parameter.name: ping_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: The timeout in seconds till an individual ping-probe is accounted as lost

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.shortdesc: Disable logging to stderr. Does not affect --verbose or --debug-file or logging to syslog.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.shortdesc: Verbose mode

parameter.name: debug
parameter.shortdesc: Write debug information to given file

parameter.name: debug_file
parameter.shortdesc: Write debug information to given file

parameter.name: version
parameter.shortdesc: Display version information and exit

parameter.name: help
parameter.shortdesc: Display help and exit

parameter.name: delay
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds before fencing is started

parameter.name: login_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds for cmd prompt after login

parameter.name: power_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Test X seconds for status change after ON/OFF

parameter.name: power_wait
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds after issuing ON/OFF

parameter.name: shell_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds for cmd prompt after issuing command

parameter.name: retry_on
parameter.shortdesc: Count of attempts to retry power on
